headline: How Recent Developments Are Reframing The FedEx (FDX) Investment Story Through 2029
summary: The latest update to our FedEx view lifts fair value from US$306.54 to US$370.46 per share, supported by a slightly lower 8.67% discount rate and a modest increase in the assumed 4.26% annual revenue growth rate. These adjustments reflect how recent Investor Day messaging and street research are reshaping expectations around FedEx’s long term plan and the risks tied to it. Continue with this article to see how these changes fit into the broader narrative and how you can stay informed about...
